text:
Dec 1, 2, 3, 4 & 5:
• Working on assigned issues
• Got 4 issues assigned
• Raised 4 PRs for the respective issues
• Received suggestions and implemented all suggested changes
• Waiting for review and merge on all 4 PRs
Requesting to be assigned new issues so I can continue contributing further

Please review and give me new tasks. i am Waiting for new task.
My PRs have been reviewed and approved, but they haven’t been merged for the last week.
Here is the link: https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pulls/adarsh-priydarshi-5646

Dec 8th Update:
• Raised PR on the assigned issue
• Waiting for a new task
• PRs are ready for merge:- https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pulls/adarsh-priydarshi-5646

Dec 8 & 9
• Waiting for a new task

Dec 10
• merged 1 pr
• reviewed prs
• Waiting for next task

Dec 10th
• made some changes in existing PR
• Waiting for next task

Dec 11
• Created 3 new issues.
• Made the requested changes in the existing PR as suggested by the mentor.
• Waiting for a new task.
